description:
The members of SHONEN HOLLYWOOD decide to put on the Christmas concert without help from Shima or their former President. They realize how much they love SHONEN HOLLYWOOD and HOLLYWOOD TOKYO as they dedicate themselves to practice and preparation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even If There Comes a Day We Close Our Eyes
Hitomi o Tojiru Hi ga Kite mo
瞳を閉じる日が来ても
